description.value: This small toy fox has tufted, fluffy ears and buttons for eyes. When activated, it transforms into a big fox with the statistics of a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.pathfinder-bestiary.Actor.Riding Dog]. The stuffed fox always allows you to ride it. While you do, you don't take the -2 penalty to Reflex saves while being mounted, and its jaws Strike gains @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.Item.Knockdown]. The stuffed fox can be activated once a day and remains in its form for up to 1 hour.
